caption:
The FORREC plant for refrigerator processing is designed with a production cycle that ensures the safe processing of refrigerators, guaranteeing the use of all their components with zero environmental impact.
 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
About us 

FORREC SPA designs and manufatures recycling plant machinery and equipment to process solid industrial waste and municipal waste. From shredders, to hammer mills and granulators, FORREC exports recycling machinery to over 20 Countries and counts on more than 30 years experience.

https://www.forrec.eu/ 

Please contact us at: info@forrec.it 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Follow FORREC on: 
LinkedIn: https://it.linkedin.com/company/forrec-spa
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ForrecRecycling

FORREC develops and produces customised machines and complete recycling line for WEEE, small appliances with the separation and recovery of ferrous, non ferrous, plastics. Recovery also of cables, PCBs, batteries and condensators. Find more in the video. 
Visit ►https://www.forrec.eu/recycling-plant-machinery/weee.html
